attributes.action: grant Hilmi Eryilmaz's visa to remain in the UK after the death of his baby girl
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to get Hilmi Eryilmaz visa granted after a refusal to remain in the UK , he came to the UK to bury his 9 week old daughter with his british wife. refusal grounds that the demise of your daughter is not a sufficently compassionate enough reason to be granted his visa !

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
